title: Do Tulsa Trump Rally Attendees Have To Sign COVID-19 Waiver?
subtitle: The Trump campaign announced a rally at the same time public health officials recommended that people avoid big gatherings.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The reelection campaign for U.S. President Donald Trump required attendees reserving tickets for a June 20, 2020, rally in Tulsa to agree they will not sue the campaign or event organizers should they be exposed to COVID-19 at the event.
